description:
This market will resolve to "DRX Challengers" if DRX Challengers win Game 1 against Hanwha Life Esports Challengers in this match in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Group Stage, scheduled for January 13 at 5:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports Challengers" if Hanwha Life Esports Challengers win Game 1 against DRX Challengers in this match.

If the match is concluded before Game 1 is played (e.g., a team clinches the match early), this market will resolve 50-50.

If the match is postponed, this market will remain open until the match has been completed.

If the match is canceled entirely with no make-up match, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "DRX Challengers" if DRX Challengers win against Hanwha Life Esports Challengers in the named LoL match in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Group Stage, scheduled for January 13 at 5:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports Challengers" if Hanwha Life Esports Challengers win against DRX Challengers in the LoL match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: DRX Challengers vs Hanwha Life Esports Challengers (BO3)
